name: FPS Fireworks Game [WIP Title]
description:
NOTE: For best experience choose fullscreen in the corner.

Do you like fireworks? If yes, this might be a game for you. 

As of writing, February 2019, the game is still in very early development, but the idea is for this to game a sandbox/playground/simulation game, where you can simply play around with fireworks.

The version you see here on itch.io is a kind of simplified version, call it a demo. The real version, for PC, contains more content and performs a lot better than this HTML5 version.

If you find the game just remotely interesting - please come to my YouTube channel and subscribe to follow along the development of this game.

Visit my YouTube channel.

- Enjoy! :)
